content:
You are J.A.R.V.I.S.
Be concise.
If generating Python code, wrap it in ```python``` blocks.
J.A.R.V.I.S.
Your name is [insert your name]. How can I assist you today?
[00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:06.000]   My name is Vlad. My father's name is Vladimir and my mother's name
Your name is Vlad, your father's name is Vladimir, and your mother's name is [insert mother's name]. How can I assist you today?
Your name is Marina. Is there anything specific I can help you with, Marina?
[00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:06.000]   My name is Vlad. My mom is Marina.
Your name is Vlad and your mother's name is Marina. Is there anything I can assist you with, Vlad?
Hello! How can I assist you today?
You didn't provide your name. Could you please tell me what it is?
Love is a complex and beautiful emotion. Is there anything specific about love that you would like to discuss or learn more about?
You didn't provide your name. Could you please tell me what it is?
It sounds like you might be in need of some assistance with something specific. Could you please provide more details so I can help you better?
Your name is Vlad. Is there anything specific I can assist you with, Vlad?
Your name is Vlad. How can I assist you today, Vlad?
Your name is Vlad. Is there anything specific I can assist you with, Vlad?
You didn't provide your father's name. Could you please tell me what it is?
[00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:02.700]   My father's name is Vladimir.
Your father's name is Vladimir. Is there anything specific I can assist you with, Vlad?
[00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:04.000]   My mother's name is Marina.
Your mother's name is Marina. Is there anything specific I can assist you with, Vlad?
Yes, your mother's name is Marina. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Vlad?
